job_description: ActiveState Software Inc. is looking for a Technical Support Engineer to> be a part of our growing, vibrant company. This is a full time, permanent> position in our Vancouver office working on Stackato, our next generation> cloud application management platform.>> Candidates should bring at least 1 year of experience in a support> position, a hunger for problem-solving, great communication skills, and> impressive skills in troubleshooting open source technology. You have a> desire to understand and play with newer, cutting-edge technologies and> software methodologies, and thrive in a fun and fast paced workplace.>>> If you think you've got what it takes, and you can put check marks next to> most of the requirements below, then send us that HR-friendly stuff today.>> Responsibilities:>> • Technical support and problem verification> • Quality assurance testing for ActiveState's multi-language platform as a> service environment and tools> • Online support and community involvement> • Administration of dev and test systems> • Willingness to facilitate open and effective communication with internal> and external teams>
job_requirements: Requirements:>> • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent industry experience> • Minimum one year of experience working in software support, System> Administration, or related environments> • Excellent written and verbal communication skills> • Excellent problem solving skills> • Technical knowledge and system administration experience in Linux> environments> • Flexibility and adaptability for working in an ever-changing, dynamic> environment with rapidly changing priorities and goals>> Highly Desirable Qualifications:>> • Knowledge of Java or Ruby> • Experience with virtualization software (e.g. VMware, VirtualBox)> • Network administration experience>> Other Desirable Qualifications:>> • Experience with one or more ticket tracking systems> • Experience with QA processes> • Technical knowledge in Mac OS X and Windows environments> • Experience working with source code control software> • Intermediate scripting/dynamic language skills, including past or> current use of ActiveState Perl, Python, and/or Tcl productsOpen To All Majors:No
